title: Shavette Straight Razor
subtitle: Enjoy the advantages of traditional shaving tool

marketingArguments.title: Sustainable & Biodegradable
marketingArguments.speech: Designed with natural materials, wood and stainless. Keep it for year

marketingArguments.title: Better quality shaving and cleaner
marketingArguments.speech: Offers a better quality shave, closer to the skin and does not miss any hair, whereas with an electric razor it will be necessary to return several times.

marketingArguments.title: Save money
marketingArguments.speech: Using a traditional shaver has been proven to cost less than a modern razor. Blades last longer and are cheaper

marketingArguments.title: Time Saver
marketingArguments.speech: With training and practice this is much faster than using a modern shaving instrument
